part_visibility.rightArm: (query.main_hand_item_use_duration && q.get_equipped_item_name=='bandage' || v.item_elemental_equipped_any || v.new_weapon || v.weapon || query.get_equipped_item_name(0, 1) == '' || query.get_equipped_item_name(0, 1) == 'filled_map') || (v.holding_sword&&v.oreville_mainhand_visible)

part_visibility.rightSleeve: (query.main_hand_item_use_duration && q.get_equipped_item_name=='bandage' || v.item_elemental_equipped_any || v.new_weapon || v.weapon || query.get_equipped_item_name(0, 1) == '' || query.get_equipped_item_name(0, 1) == 'filled_map') || (v.holding_sword&&v.oreville_mainhand_visible)

part_visibility.leftArm: query.main_hand_item_use_duration && q.get_equipped_item_name=='bandage' || v.item_elemental_equipped_any || v.new_weapon || v.weapon || (query.get_equipped_item_name(0, 1) == 'filled_map' && query.get_equipped_item_name('off_hand') != 'shield') || (query.get_equipped_item_name('off_hand') == 'filled_map' && !query.item_is_charged) || (!query.item_is_charged && (variable.item_use_normalized > 0 && variable.item_use_normalized < 1.0))

part_visibility.leftSleeve: query.main_hand_item_use_duration && q.get_equipped_item_name=='bandage' || v.item_elemental_equipped_any || v.weapon || (query.get_equipped_item_name(0, 1) == 'filled_map' && query.get_equipped_item_name('off_hand') != 'shield') || (query.get_equipped_item_name('off_hand') == 'filled_map' && !query.item_is_charged) || (!query.item_is_charged && (variable.item_use_normalized > 0 && variable.item_use_normalized < 1.0))
